name: Arctica
description:
ALL DONATIONS WILL BE PASSED DIRECTLY ON TO THE WWF ORGANISATION
Or DONATE DIRECTLY.

Every year between 200 and 2000 animals become extinct, with the largest cause being habitat loss due to human action. Animals are losing their HOMES. Acrtica brings to the players attention the effects of climate change on polar habitats, where once vast icescapes are being reduced to water. You play as a polar bear desperatly searching for food in a swiftly changing world.

This game was created in 48 hours for the 2019 Global Game Jam.

Credits:
Adrianna Kaminska - Countless hours of pain in the Unity Animator.
Ash Healy - Painstakingly crafted guilt-trip pixel art.
Toran Bruce Richards - Painless programming
Jamesy Downie - Music / Soundtrack

This is very much a work in progress, so please forgive the countless bugs and errors.
